summary: Hello I am a chartered accountant by qualification and an orator by passion. To describe myself in 3 words I am a people person full of energy, motivation and dedication for work.My career objective is to build my career on the pillars of dedication, expertise, quest of learning and at the same time I also ensure that I direct all my passion ,knowledge and skill sets towards the development and growth of the organization. With an aim of both side growth and to invest best of mine to produce best outcomes.To work in highly dynamic and progressive organization at challenging position.

school.name: The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
SPB english medum commerce college, south gujarat university

education.field_of_study: bachelor of commerce with specialization in taxation

company.name: Americold Logistics, LLC. (formerly AGRO Merchants Group)

profile_positions.company: Americold Logistics, LLC. (formerly AGRO Merchants Group)
profile_positions.title: Europe FP&A Controller

profile_positions.description:
Currently working in regional business finance team, working closely with region’s CFO, Country Finance Heads and Corporate finance. Track record of strong financial, operating performance. 

 Annual Budget Consolidation:
• Revenue Consolidation - Responsible for Europe & ANZ regions with a revenue base of $300Mn. Provide support in collaborating with business heads across markets to provide analytical overview on growth, price & volume variances on the top products.
• Cost planning - includes collaboration with costing team on product costing, analyze product profitability, monitor product with low gross contribution
• Expense consolidation-includes co-ordination with all departments to collate their expense budget, provide qualitative analysis to management. 
• Support in consolidation of complete Management P&L and support business head in preparation for corporate review of budgets.

 Management Reporting:
• Monthly & Quarterly Reporting - detailed budget versus actual achievement analysis. Also includes working capital overview for receivables and inventory holding.
• Monthly Sales Dashboard – helps business to review the performance of top products including analysis of gross contribution.
• Preparation of various Analytical Presentations of the GC, Expenses, Revenue, Reason for variation for a better view to the Top Management.
• Support to the Local Finance teams in WEU & ANZ region in respect of MIS reporting.
#FinancialAnalysis #Accounting #SAP #Finance #FinancialAnalyst #Audit #Financial Reporting
profile_positions.title: Financial Planning Analyst

profile_positions.description:
• Ensure transactions are posted to the correct accounts and accurately reflect the
business purpose of the transaction
• Prepare reconciliations on a monthly base (and fulfills related documentation
obligations)
• Reviewing ageing of company balances, and resolving issues relating to these.
• Liaise with relevant parties (buyers, requestors and suppliers, etc.) to resolve critical
invoice discrepancies.
profile_positions.title: Finance Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Worked with the service tax team.The job role includes dealing with clients from various fields, it includes compliance with current provisions, advising the clients on various tax crunches, keeping updated with the upcoming laws (goods and service tax).
• Rich experience in entire indirect tax field having an all round exposure in all aspects like registration, refund filings, handling of service tax audits, return filings etc.
• Overseeing administration of the internal department of service tax with the client and the government bodies maintaining coordination for smooth functioning
• Computing & arranging for timely deposit of taxes (Service Tax); filing the returns for timely completion of assessment and ensuring statutory compliance.
profile_positions.title: Financial and tax accountant

profile_positions.description:
I did my articleship here ( a 3 year training to be completed under course of chartered accountancy). 
• Rich experience in entire indirect tax field having an all round exposure in all aspects like registration, refund filings, handling of service tax audits, return filings etc.
• Overseeing administration of the internal department of service tax with the client and the government bodies maintaining coordination for smooth functioning
• Computing & arranging for timely deposit of taxes (Service Tax); filing the returns for timely completion of assessment and ensuring statutory compliance
• Experienced in accounting & finance operations entailing preparation & maintenance of statutory books of accounts and administering the finalization of year-end financial statements of various Firms and Closely held Private and Public companies
• Implementing systems, procedures & manuals for preparation & maintenance of statutory books of accounts & financial statements and ensuring compliance with the statutory requirement
• Preparing internal & statutory audit schedules on quarterly and yearly basis
• Active involvement in Assessment Proceedings
profile_positions.title: Internship

volunteer_experiences.description: I started my journey as a team member here in IGIP department.My work over here was to source clients for the organization.Basically we had to meet different busniessman and had to convince them to hire students from overseas either as an intern or an employee. I was soon promoted for my work skills from team member to team leader.Outof my 1 yearr experience i worked for 10 months as a team leader.I had also been declared as team member of the month in my very first year.
